question.xref: DES s6, HC r103, HC p103
question.text: Which arm signal tells you that the car you are following is going to pull up?

explanation.text: There may be occasions when drivers need to give an arm signal to confirm an indicator. This could include in bright sunshine, at a complex road layout, when stopping at a pedestrian crossing or when turning right just after passing a parked vehicle. You should understand what each arm signal means. If you give arm signals, make them clear, correct and decisive.
